entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 9:43 PM CST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:43 PM CST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening then snow. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 9:43 PM CST Friday 31 March 2023
